Articles.Content: Im a streamer that usually play this game, Im from spain and i would like to be in the featured streamer to make more people know my channel. I dont know who i must talk to or were to fill my request. Thx my channel is www.twitch.tv/rodrimin8

Hi Rodrimin8, and welcome to the forum. 

Why don't you share some of your vids in the Fan Works section, and if enough people are interested, it might catch Squad's attention.
